title: Allotment of tenements either in-situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent, to the other Non- Prote
clause_text: Allotment of tenements either in-situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent, to the other Non- Protected Occupiers up to the 1st January 2011, subject to the availability of tenements shall be done, as per the terms, conditions and guidelines so notified in the Official Gazette, by the Chief Executive Officer with the prior approval of the State Government;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
